Throws:
java.lang.Exception

execute

public void execute(java.lang.String[] args)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException,
                    java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Given a indexing parameters it starts a indexing. Different indexing type are: SF2HB = Simple File(csv,tsv) to hbase directly. SF2HF = Simple File(csv,tsv) to HFile, which can be loaded to Hbase using LoadIncrementalHfiles. class from hbase. SF2MF = Simple File(csv,tsv) to MapFile (key as Text and value as BytesWritable) MF2HB = Map File(key and value as csv,tsv) to hbase. MF2HF = Map File(key and value as csv,tsv) to HFile, which can be loaded to Hbase using LoadIncrementalHfiles. class from hbase. MF2MF = Map File(key and value as csv,tsv) to MapFile(key as Text and value as BytesWritable) HB2HB = Hbase to Hbase HB2HF = Hbase to HFile which can be loaded to Hbase using LoadIncrementalHfiles. class from hbase. HB2MF = Hbase to MapFile(key as Text and value as BytesWritable)

Parameters:
args -
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.InterruptedException
